thread.title: ACI-NA Congratulates Port Columbus's Elaine Roberts for Recognition by White House as a Transportation “Champion of Change”Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: ACI-NA Congratulates Port Columbus's Elaine Roberts for Recognition by White House as a Transportation “Champion of Change”Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: ACI-NA Congratulates Port Columbus's Elaine Roberts for Recognition by White House as a Transportation “Champion of Change”Travelandtourworld.com
text:
ACI-NA Congratulates Port Columbus’s Elaine Roberts for Recognition by White House as a Transportation “Champion of Change” Published on : Thursday, October 15, 2015
Airports Council International-North America (ACI-NA) President and CEO Kevin M. Burke today issued the following statement in recognition of Elaine Roberts, President and CEO of the Columbus Regional Airport Authority, being named a “Champion of Change” for transportation by the White House.
“Elaine is a proven and well-respected leader in the U.S. airport industry, and ACI-NA applauds this deserved recognition for her work. Under her leadership, the Columbus Regional Airport Authority stands out as a prime example of a generator of economic growth that benefits its community. Elaine’s collaborative approach results in sustainable, innovative solutions that ensures a stronger and more competitive North American business environment.
Source: ACI-NA
